titleStmt.title: The Division of the county of Essex into severall classes together with the names of the ministers and others fit to be of each classis [sic] ; ... for the judging of scandall, and approving the classes in the severall counties of England.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped, stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
